DOC.brief_summary: This noninterventional, open-label study will observe the safety and tolerability of peginterferon alfa-2a in combination with ribavirin among Austrian participants treated for HCV infection according to routine practice.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Peginterferon Alfa-2a Plus Ribavirin for Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection in Austria
DOC.criteria: Ongoing treatment with peginterferon alfa2a and ribavirin at the discretion of the prescribing physician HCV infection None specified
